game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is hidden within the forgotten ruins. Retrieve it to gain great power.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Make your way to the coordinates marked on the ancient map.
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to claim the artifact.
